name: Lêker û Hevok
description: Learn essential Kurdish verbs in affirmative and negative forms, build sentences with question-answer patterns, and master four negation rules.

lessons.name: Deh Lêker
lessons.description: Learn 10 verbs in both affirmative and negative forms with real sentence examples.

learningObjective.en: Learn 10 verbs in both affirmative and negative forms with real sentence examples
learningObjective.de: Lerne 10 Verben in bejahender und verneinender Form mit echten Satzbeispielen

instruction.en: Learn this verb pair

content.example: Em neynikê difroşin. Em neynikê nafroşin.

exampleTranslation.en: We sell the mirror. We don't sell the mirror.
exampleTranslation.de: Wir verkaufen den Spiegel. Wir verkaufen den Spiegel nicht.

instruction.en: Learn this verb pair

content.example: Hêlîn helbestê dinivîse. Serhat helbestê nanivîse.

exampleTranslation.en: Hêlîn writes the poem. Serhat does not write the poem.
exampleTranslation.de: Hêlîn schreibt das Gedicht. Serhat schreibt das Gedicht nicht.

instruction.en: Learn this verb pair

content.example: Jin pere dide. Mêr pere nade.

exampleTranslation.en: The woman gives money. The man does not give money.
exampleTranslation.de: Die Frau gibt Geld. Der Mann gibt kein Geld.

instruction.en: Read the affirmative and negative pairs
instruction.de: Lies die bejahenden und verneinenden Paare

lines.ku: Em neynikê difroşin. — Em neynikê nafroşin.
lines.en: We sell the mirror. — We don't sell the mirror.
lines.de: Wir verkaufen den Spiegel. — Wir verkaufen den Spiegel nicht.

lines.ku: Tu gulê digirî. — Tu gulê nagirî.
lines.en: You hold the rose. — You don't hold the rose.
lines.de: Du hältst die Rose. — Du hältst die Rose nicht.

lines.ku: Amed rojnameyê dikire. — Amed rojnameyê nakire.
lines.en: Amed buys the newspaper. — Amed doesn't buy the newspaper.
lines.de: Amed kauft die Zeitung. — Amed kauft die Zeitung nicht.

lines.ku: Hêlîn helbestê dinivîse. — Serhat helbestê nanivîse.
lines.en: Hêlîn writes the poem. — Serhat doesn't write the poem.
lines.de: Hêlîn schreibt das Gedicht. — Serhat schreibt das Gedicht nicht.

lines.ku: Jin pere dide. — Mêr pere nade.
lines.en: The woman gives money. — The man doesn't give money.
lines.de: Die Frau gibt Geld. — Der Mann gibt kein Geld.

lines.ku: Ronî kartolê dixwe. — Hûn kartolê naxwin.
lines.en: Ronî eats potatoes. — You (pl.) don't eat potatoes.
lines.de: Ronî isst Kartoffeln. — Ihr esst keine Kartoffeln.

instruction.en: How do you negate "difroşin" (we sell)?

explanation.en: For regular verbs, replace the di- prefix with na-: difroşin → nafroşin. This is the standard negation pattern for present tense.
explanation.de: Bei regulären Verben wird das Präfix di- durch na- ersetzt: difroşin → nafroşin. Das ist das Standardmuster für die Verneinung im Präsens.

instruction.en: "Hêlîn helbestê dinivîse." What does Hêlîn do?

explanation.en: dinivîse = writes (from nivîsîn = to write). helbest = poem. Hêlîn writes the poem.
explanation.de: dinivîse = schreibt (von nivîsîn = schreiben). helbest = Gedicht. Hêlîn schreibt das Gedicht.

instruction.en: Make it negative: Jin pere dide. → Mêr pere ___.
instruction.de: Verneine: Jin pere dide. → Mêr pere ___.

explanation.en: dide → nade. Replace di- with na-: dide → nade. The man does not give money.
explanation.de: dide → nade. Ersetze di- durch na-: dide → nade. Der Mann gibt kein Geld.

instruction.en: Make it negative: Ez xanî dibînim. → Hêlîn xanî ___.
instruction.de: Verneine: Ez xanî dibînim. → Hêlîn xanî ___.

explanation.en: dibîne → nabîne. Replace di- with na- for he/she form. Hêlîn does not see the house.
explanation.de: dibîne → nabîne. Ersetze di- durch na- für die er/sie-Form. Hêlîn sieht das Haus nicht.

instruction.en: Match each affirmative with its negative
instruction.de: Ordne jede bejahende Form der verneinenden zu

instruction.en: "Ronî kartolê dixwe." What is kartol?

explanation.en: kartol = potato (from German Kartoffel). "Ronî kartolê dixwe" = Ronî eats potatoes.
explanation.de: kartol = Kartoffel (vom deutschen Wort Kartoffel). "Ronî kartolê dixwe" = Ronî isst Kartoffeln.

lessons.name: Hevok Çêkirin
lessons.description: Build questions and answers using verbs: avêtin, çûn, dan, dîtin with real Kurdish sentence patterns.

learningObjective.en: Build questions and answers using verbs: avêtin, çûn, dan, dîtin — with real Kurdish sentence patterns
learningObjective.de: Bilde Fragen und Antworten mit den Verben: avêtin, çûn, dan, dîtin — mit echten kurdischen Satzmustern

instruction.en: Learn this question pattern

content.example: Tu çi davêjî? — Ez zebeşê davêjim.

instruction.en: Learn this question pattern

instruction.en: Read the Q&A pairs

lines.ku: Tu çi davêjî? — Ez zebeşê davêjim.
lines.en: What do you throw? — I throw the watermelon.
lines.de: Was wirfst du? — Ich werfe die Wassermelone.

lines.ku: Tu diçî ku? — Ez diçim Berlinê.
lines.en: Where do you go? — I go to Berlin.
lines.de: Wohin gehst du? — Ich gehe nach Berlin.

lines.ku: Ez naçim Hamburgê.
lines.en: I don't go to Hamburg.
lines.de: Ich gehe nicht nach Hamburg.

lines.ku: Tu çi didî? — Ez goşt didim.
lines.en: What do you give? — I give meat.
lines.de: Was gibst du? — Ich gebe Fleisch.

lines.ku: Ez xwêyê nadim.
lines.en: I don't give salt.
lines.de: Ich gebe kein Salz.

lines.ku: Kî kê dibîne? — Alan Delalê dibîne.
lines.en: Who sees whom? — Alan sees Delal.
lines.de: Wer sieht wen? — Alan sieht Delal.

lines.ku: Meryem çiya dibîne. Hêvî gur dibîne.
lines.en: Meryem sees the mountain. Hêvî sees the wolf.
lines.de: Meryem sieht den Berg. Hêvî sieht den Wolf.

instruction.en: "Tu diçî ku?" — What does this question ask?
instruction.de: "Tu diçî ku?" — Was fragt diese Frage?

explanation.en: "Tu diçî ku?" = Where do you go? diçî = you go (from çûn), ku = where (destination).
explanation.de: "Tu diçî ku?" = Wohin gehst du? diçî = du gehst (von çûn), ku = wohin (Ziel).

instruction.en: "Kî kê dibîne?" — Alan Delalê dibîne. Who sees whom?
instruction.de: "Kî kê dibîne?" — Alan Delalê dibîne. Wer sieht wen?

explanation.en: Kî = who (subject), kê = whom (object). Alan (subject) Delalê (object, fem. +ê) dibîne (sees). Alan sees Delal.
explanation.de: Kî = wer (Subjekt), kê = wen (Objekt). Alan (Subjekt) Delalê (Objekt, fem. +ê) dibîne (sieht). Alan sieht Delal.

instruction.en: Complete: Tu çi ___? — Ez zebeşê davêjim.
instruction.de: Vervollständige: Tu çi ___? — Ez zebeşê davêjim.

explanation.en: For "tu" (you), the ending is -î: davêjî. The verb avêtin (to throw) → davêjî in present tense for tu.
explanation.de: Für "tu" (du) ist die Endung -î: davêjî. Das Verb avêtin (werfen) → davêjî im Präsens für tu.

instruction.en: Complete: Ez diçim ___.

explanation.en: City names take -ê when used as a destination: Berlin → Berlinê. "Ez diçim Berlinê" = I go to Berlin.
explanation.de: Städtenamen erhalten -ê als Zielangabe: Berlin → Berlinê. "Ez diçim Berlinê" = Ich gehe nach Berlin.

instruction.en: Match the question to the correct answer
instruction.de: Ordne die Frage der richtigen Antwort zu

instruction.en: Make it negative: Ez diçim Kölnê. → Ez ___ Kölnê.
instruction.de: Verneine: Ez diçim Kölnê. → Ez ___ Kölnê.

explanation.en: diçim → naçim. Replace di- with na-: I don't go to Cologne.
explanation.de: diçim → naçim. Ersetze di- durch na-: Ich gehe nicht nach Köln.

lessons.name: Erênî û Neyînî
lessons.description: Master the four negation patterns in Kurdish: bûn→ne, verbs→na-, zanîn/karîn→ni-, hebûn→tune.

learningObjective.en: Master the four negation patterns in Kurdish: bûn→ne, verbs→na-, zanîn/karîn→ni-, hebûn→tune
learningObjective.de: Meistere die vier Verneinungsmuster im Kurdischen: bûn→ne, Verben→na-, zanîn/karîn→ni-, hebûn→tune

instruction.en: Learn negation rule 1

translation.en: For bûn (to be): add 'ne' before the adjective
translation.de: Für bûn (sein): 'ne' vor das Adjektiv setzen

content.example: Ez baş im → Ez ne baş im.

exampleTranslation.en: I am good → I am not good.
exampleTranslation.de: Mir geht es gut → Mir geht es nicht gut.

instruction.en: Learn negation rule 2

translation.en: Replace di- with na- for all regular verbs
translation.de: Ersetze di- durch na- bei allen regulären Verben

exampleTranslation.en: Agît sees → Agît does not see.

instruction.en: Learn negation rule 3

translation.en: zanîn (know) and karîn (can) use ni- instead of na-
translation.de: zanîn (wissen) und karîn (können) verwenden ni- statt na-

content.example: Ez kurdî dizanim → Ez tirkî nizanim.

exampleTranslation.en: I know Kurdish → I don't know Turkish.
exampleTranslation.de: Ich kann Kurdisch → Ich kann kein Türkisch.

instruction.en: Learn negation rule 4

translation.en: For hebûn (to have/exist): use 'tune' for negation

exampleTranslation.en: There is water → There is no water.
exampleTranslation.de: Es gibt Wasser → Es gibt kein Wasser.

instruction.de: Lies die Fragen und Antworten mit Ja/Nein

instruction.en: How do you negate "Ez kurdî dizanim"?

explanation.en: zanîn (to know) uses the special ni- prefix for negation: dizanim → nizanim. This also applies to karîn (to be able).
explanation.de: zanîn (wissen) verwendet das spezielle Präfix ni- zur Verneinung: dizanim → nizanim. Das gilt auch für karîn (können).

instruction.en: Which negation pattern is used with bûn (to be)?
instruction.de: Welches Verneinungsmuster wird bei bûn (sein) verwendet?

explanation.en: With bûn, the word "ne" is placed before the adjective/noun: Ez baş im → Ez ne baş im. Ew tî ye → Ew ne tî ye.
explanation.de: Bei bûn wird das Wort "ne" vor das Adjektiv/Nomen gesetzt: Ez baş im → Ez ne baş im. Ew tî ye → Ew ne tî ye.

instruction.en: Negate: Ew diçin → Ew ___.

explanation.en: çûn is a regular verb, so replace di- with na-: diçin → naçin.
explanation.de: çûn ist ein reguläres Verb, also ersetze di- durch na-: diçin → naçin.

instruction.en: Negate: Ez tirkî dizanim → Ez tirkî ___.
instruction.de: Verneine: Ez tirkî dizanim → Ez tirkî ___.

explanation.en: zanîn uses ni- for negation: dizanim → nizanim. NOT nazanim!
explanation.de: zanîn verwendet ni- zur Verneinung: dizanim → nizanim. NICHT nazanim!

instruction.en: Match each verb type to its negation pattern
instruction.de: Ordne jedem Verbtyp sein Verneinungsmuster zu
